basics.label: Hair stylist and hair technician
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2020.

skills.name: Vietnamese
keywords: Proficient in speaking, reading, and writing

education.Summary: 9 months of full time training totaling to 1500 clocked hours

work.summary: Hair stylist and barber in charge of hair care for customers
highlights: Perform all hair styling related task such as styling, and coloring
Perform all barber tasks such as cutting and trimming
Consulting with clients on stylistic options for their hair
Adhering to salon safety and cleanliness standards
